column5: No, PS3 and xbox 360 are different networks. Its too bad they arent the same, it would make for some pretty crazy games.

" I used to play video games..............then I turned 14. (just kidding....well not really)"  I'll be 44 this year and I like playing games, where else can you race the pro's? in NASCAR games, you get to race in the safety of your own home, Burnout Paradise lets me drive and wreck around with people from all around the world, Call of Duty is awesome as many other games. Graphics are getting right up there now that it even has the feel of being there.  But then again, some people didn't even have fun when they were 14.  I actually bought mine for the Blueray and I needed a new DVD player, but a PS3 does everything, music library, picture library, video library, and games, all in HDTV on the big screen. It's an all in one entertainment center.  I got my 101% on Burnout, now waiting for the new upgrade that's suppose to add a whole new section to the map, and word has it, it's gonna be free.  Also PS3 owner, we should have another firmware update this week sometime. Firmware 2.20
My son.. age 20, plays COD4 on XBox... his user name is Heavy d911, if anyone would like to add him....
Slight off topic.  But..  Did you know?  Playstation 3 is the best BluRay DVD player !
ok even more off topic is anyone selling their ps2 games?

It also upscales your old dvds to play on HDTV. BluRay is what I initially bought it for but it's an awesome all around entertainment center. Already wireless so no wires to hook up for internet. There browser could use some work though. Some days I'm on OFC with the PS3. Picked up a PSP, it's another great little gadget.

Hey  My wife bought me a 80 GIG Playstation 3 for our 10 year anny>   And Call of duty 4  My questions is : Does anyone here play that game,  and do you play online.  My user name online is DRMASSE so if you see me  add me to your friends list  Dave
I thought you were a fisherman and now you're posing as a Doctor !
I love video games but have a strict no gaming policy as it would seriously cut into my musical practice time! Sounds rad though. Have fun with that!

I'm not familiar with the online part of gaming. Can you play cross platform? I have an old Xbox my son gave me when he got Xbox 360 but I only have COD3 for it. I have COD 4 for the PC ( and will be playing it once I get a better video card)  JF
haha i play that game at my friends, its sickkkkkk wicked
You still playing DOCTOR at your age Dave ?...Kinky !
Hey Dave sounds like your wife is trying to keep you at home and not out fishing  I also have the game and play online. My user name is LTPRO add me to your list.
think it might be my next game to pick up
DRMASSE  Dave Raymond Masse  but if the Doctor part works for the women,  then so be it LOL  I will add you..  Dave

My son has one but plays the sports games only, basketball, hockey, football, golf.... Even I started to play golf on it! Got hooked on it during the Christmas break but he won't play with me anymore cause I'm too easy to beat!  He plays on line once in a while.
Tiger Woods golf is how it starts.  JF

My son plays COD4 lots, I like Burnout Paradise. I'm not fast enough with the COD4 shooting. I watch my son play, and it's a pretty awesome game, awesome graphics. Were use to hering "our AV is online". You'll know what I mean once you play it. I just picked up a PSP also, been fiddling around with that a bit.
That's right!   Tiger Woods Golf! I usually control Tiger and my son has his own character made up. I don't do that poorly, usually under par by several strokes but he is better
My son is a CPGA pro and he loves the game. That's why he got it for me.  JF
My brother got a wii last week and the Fishing game on it is incredible! you can cast, and it picks it up, its neat
I play online a lot. add me on xfire if you see me. Still fairly new to online gameing so go easy on me.  DarthJ  jjcanoe

I am absolutely addicted to COD4 on PS3. I literally just took a break from playing for about 4 hours already today. I am so pleased with my PS3, which really is a home theater essential with the blue ray player and large built in hard drive.
sorry bud , Im with the microsoft team...call of duty is way to addicting...Im scared to see what happens when these new maps get released !!!

I play COD4 P.C version online it's my second time around Commander status, the game is fast paced unless you snipe with the 50 cal. other than that have fun its one exciting online game.  P.S Once you unlock that P90 theres no turning back and make sure you pick your perks wisely.
I'm thinkin' this kinda stuff would take time and money away from fishin'...  ... aren't video games for little kids anyway?
I'm with you Dawg..Cept for Need for speed,Porsche Unleashed,the only video game ever needed. Joe
Didn't you hear about the boy inside the man?  JF
Added you.  Anyone, feel free to add me as well.  STOTY   is my PSN id.
I used to play video games..............then I turned 14. (just kidding....well not really)
COD4 is honestly the best game, great pick! I recently start to play this game on Xbox 360, not sure if its the same network as PS3.
